meanings.definition: The bone of the upper arm or forelimb, forming joints at the shoulder and the elbow.
meanings.sent1: The humerus connects the shoulder to the elbow.
meanings.sent2: She felt pain in her humerus after playing tennis.
meanings.sent3: The humerus bone decided to take a break from all the heavy lifting.
meanings.sent4: His humor was as strong as a humerus bone.
meanings.sent5: The humerus, like a bridge, supports movement from the shoulder to the elbow.

meanings.definition: A long bone in the arm or forelimb that extends from the shoulder to the elbow.
meanings.sent1: The humerus is one of the longest bones in the body.
meanings.sent2: He broke his humerus in a skateboarding accident.
meanings.sent3: The humerus bone waved hello to the radius and ulna.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as unbreakable as a humerus bone.
meanings.sent5: The humerus bone, like a sturdy pillar, supports the upper limb.
